snippet.title: Far Cry 3 Classic Edition – Launch trailer
snippet.description:
Re-experience the thrill of the Far Cry 3 single player campaign with Far Cry 3 Classic Edition, now available in Early Access with the Far Cry 5 Season Pass on PS4 and Xbox One.

 Standalone release June 26th.

More info: www.farcrygame.com
